review: ** ****** ** * ********* ****** **** a healing touch my Son devaansh had a poor immunity frequently used to fall sick and just one analysis the kid starts running around her prescribed medicines are brilliant and exact to work wonders she is easily accessible and recives calls to suggest medicines over call if aint around for initial emergency Approach to clinic is also homely and welcoming for both kids and Parents my 4.5 yr old son loves Dr Sowmya.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: ** ****** ** *** ** *** **** ************ * **** **** **** seeing her from day one of my child , she has a magical hand , provide the best cure , best thing is she cares about you , offline or online any days of the week she proactively delivers her duty, very committed.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We are consulting Dr. Sowmya for almost more than an year now for our son. She is very  professional, qualified and friendly person.  In a world where its tough to find doctors with all these qualities together, she is a true health guardian for our son.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My son in 5.5 yrs old now. We used to visit Dr Sowmya since my son was born for any of his illness and vaccination. She prescribes medicine only when needed and would treat the kids very patiently and explains the cause for the condition. Very approachable and a soft spoken lady. She will always respond on call during emergency and suggest the immediate steps to be taken. I highly recommend Dr Sowmya for a pediatric consultation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have been consulting Dr. Soumya for my daughter in case of illness and vaccination. Explains very well about the situation and more inclined towards home remedies and natural foods for babies. Best thing is she can be reached over her mobile and never hesitated to respond.

tags: None
review: Best thing in her is she is always available on her phone.  She doesn't say "NO" when we call her on emergency. When ever I ask her question on the Medicine she prescribe, She explain the actual medical reason why a medicine is prescribed plus she give home remedies that can be followed. Thanks for your service Doctor.

tags: None
review: High waiting time my daughter had 102 fever and they made me wait for 1.5 hours after the appointment time

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: would like to share 2 instances:firstly she prescribes medicines which are extremely rare, and hard to findsecondly it was my child's 6th week vaccine which was given and then she gives us a bill of 8000   which was a shock to us as this was not intimated to us in advance and the cost was not justified ** *** **** ******* **** **** ***** *** *** ****** **** ********its a rip off **** ****** * ***** **** **** *** *****  can advice others to check with the doctor before getting anything as such done unless you are ok to be ripped off..highly disappointed **** **** **** ** *******************

tags: None
review: Doctor didn’t spend time for investigation. Waited for 1 hr. She send us out in 2 mins. She is so impatience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: My 10 months old was suffering from high fever and vomits...doc was very friendly and her understanding of things was very clear. My baby started feeling better in single dose only..Thanku doctor.
